attributes.action: Convince the Bush Administration to commit to the June G8  objectives or be isolated
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the June G8 Chancellor Merkel and PM Blair seek unanimity to limit global temperature rise to 2 degrees Celsius, to cut emissions by 50% below 1990 levels by 2050 and raise energy efficiency in power and transport by 20%.
This US Administration has already refused to buy in. A growing list of States is going it alone believing the move is sound.
Lack of US support should be met by isolation by the rest of the G8 who should soundly condemn this US Administration.
